why: Caffeine late in the day disrupts sleep architecture and recovery.

slides.title: 2 pm Cutoff
slides.content: Avoid caffeine after ~2 pm to protect deep sleep quality.

slides.title: Swap Smart
slides.content: Choose herbal tea or decaf after lunch; hydrate steadily.

slides.title: Myth vs Fact
slides.content: Myth: I can sleep fine after espresso. Fact: Sleep depth still suffers.

slides.title: Try this week
slides.content: Set a daily cutoff alarm; track energy and sleep over 3 days.
